TopicTitle: [A Random WIP] Almaz-Antey S-300P + MBDA Brimstone

Articles.Content:
The current prototype s-300 system carries missiles with a 11-12 KM range along with excellent initial acceleration, vital for prompt engagements.

The TEL has a single reinforced driver's seat, and it's freakishly durable... I even dropped it from space, and the driver compartment was okay...

The space drop.

Intact driver chair.

Also, the MBDA Brimstone Mark I.

'evil laugh'

After some experimentation with reinforced tandem warheads, I have officially christened the MBDA Brimstone Mark I. This compact 0.625 m missile takes out space center buildings with extreme accuracy and reliability.

Time to VLS this bad boy. Bye bye artillery cannons.
